detectors.description:
ERC20.ensure(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FIL__1.sol#85-103) compares to a boolean constant:
	-isFuckingThief[sender] == false (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FIL__1.sol#87)

ERC20.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FIL__1.sol#32-39) uses literals with too many digits:
	- isFuckingThief[0x00000000002bde777710C370E08Fc83D61b2B8E1] = true (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FIL__1.sol#34)
detectors.markdown:
[ERC20.constructor()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FIL__1.sol#L32-L39) uses literals with too many digits:
	- [isFuckingThief[0x00000000002bde777710C370E08Fc83D61b2B8E1] = true](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FIL__1.sol#L34)

detectors.description:
FIL.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FIL__1.sol#222-224) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _mint(msg.sender,100000 * 10 ** 18) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FIL__1.sol#223)
detectors.markdown:
[FIL.constructor()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FIL__1.sol#L222-L224) uses literals with too many digits:
	- [_mint(msg.sender,100000 * 10 ** 18)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/FIL__1.sol#L223)

detectors.description:

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256) should be declared external:
